Text: I will always seed this, so it will always be available.
just to let you know, there are about 3000+ fonts in this.
Thanx alot!!! Do you know if the fonts are royaltyfree or not?

As far as I know they are.  Why would they be here if they werent?

If you will volunteer to check each of the 3000+ fonts to see if they are, go ahead. I wont.
Thanks alot mate. Just was i was looking for :)
thx m8, will seed this for a while :) Really appreciate your hard work.

Thanks for your hard work. It's always a thrill to find some new Scriptorium fonts, and this archive has so many! 

btw, the .pfm-.pfb fonts can be converted to .ttf and/or .otf format with FontLab Studio5. If they don't have it on thepiratebay, it's easy enough to find it on eMule. You have to complete the Font Header information to convert them properly, (pages 211-255 of the Studio5 manual).
